mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT user_id AS merid FROM hd_user_equipment UNION SELECT DISTINCT(partid) AS merid FROM hd_arearelevance WHERE type = 2 AND partid NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM hd_user_equipment )

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN state=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS onlines, SUM(CASE WHEN state=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS disline, SUM(CASE WHEN bindtype=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS disbind, SUM(CASE WHEN bindtype=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS onbind FROM hd_user_equipment ue LEFT JOIN hd_equipment e ON e.`code`=ue.equipment_code
AND ue.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT e.*,ue.user_id AS merid FROM hd_user_equipment ue LEFT JOIN hd_equipment e ON ue.equipment_code = e.`code`

SELECT q.user_id AS dealid, q.equipment_code AS `code`, e.remark AS devicename, e.tempid, e.hardversion, e.aid, e.hardversionnum, e.softversionnum, u.username AS dealnick, u.realname AS realname, u.phone_num AS telphone, a.`name` AS areaname, a.address AS areaaddress,a.manid,a.divideinto FROM hd_user_equipment q LEFT JOIN hd_equipment e ON q.equipment_code = e.`code` LEFT JOIN hd_area a ON e.aid = a.id LEFT JOIN hd_user u ON q.user_id = u.id WHERE q.equipment_code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT DISTINCT(a.partid) AS partnider FROM hd_equipment e LEFT JOIN hd_arearelevance a ON e.aid = a.aid WHERE e.`code` IN (SELECT equipment_code c FROM hd_user_equipment) AND a.type = 2
mapper.update: UPDATE hd_user_equipment SET user_id = #{dealid} WHERE equipment_code = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hd_user_role (uid, equid, port, creat_time) values (#{uid}, #{uid}, #{port}, Now())
mapper.update: UPDATE hd_user_role SET uid = #{uid} WHERE equid = #{equid} AND port = #{port}
mapper.select: SELECT u.submer FROM hd_user u LEFT JOIN hd_user_equipment ue ON u.id = ue.user_id WHERE ue.equipment_code=#{code}
